17900675Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string bar; // bar isn't an actual instance of an object, it's just a spot that can hold a stringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ManipulateBarWithRuntimeError()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bar.Substring(0, 1); // "bar" isn't actually set to anything, so how can we take a substring of it? 17900864Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.GC
17900864Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClass {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This method, the 'Finalizer' will be called when the class is destroyed.Di2015NewLine    // The 'finalizer' is essentially just the name of the class with a '~' in front.Di2015NewLine    ~MyClass() {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Destroyed!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Program {Di2015NewLine    public static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        MyClass referenceHeld = new MyClass(); // Reference heldDi2015NewLine        new MyClass(); // No reference held on this classDi2015NewLine        WeakReference sameAsNoReference = new WeakReference(new MyClass()); // Equivalent to no reference.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.GC.Collect(); // Force the garbage collector to collectDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17906005Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Create a list of locations.Di2015NewLine        List<ButtonLocation> buttonLocations = new List<ButtonLocation>() { Di2015NewLine            new ButtonLocation {Left = 100, Top = 100},Di2015NewLine            new ButtonLocation {Left = 100, Top = 200},Di2015NewLine            new ButtonLocation {Left = 100, Top = 300},Di2015NewLine            new ButtonLocation {Left = 300, Top = 400},Di2015NewLine            new ButtonLocation {Left = 300, Top = 500},Di2015NewLine            new ButtonLocation {Left = 300, Top = 600}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        //Instantiate RandomDi2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Loop through the different LocationsDi2015NewLine        while (buttonLocations.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Generate a random int from 0 to -1 of the number of possible locationsDi2015NewLine            int randomButtonLocationIndex = random.Next(0, buttonLocations.Count() - 1);Di2015NewLine            //Create New button, Rememeber to add the event to this new button!Di2015NewLine            Button button = new Button();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            button.Left = buttonLocations[randomButtonLocationIndex].Left;Di2015NewLine            button.Top = buttonLocations[randomButtonLocationIndex].Top;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.Controls.Add(button);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            buttonLocations.RemoveAt(randomButtonLocationIndex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17909731Di2015UniqueSeparatorIConstructorResolutionBehavior
17909731Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SpecialConstructorResolutionBehaviorDi2015NewLine    : IConstructorResolutionBehaviorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IConstructorResolutionBehavior original;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SpecialConstructorResolutionBehavior(Di2015NewLine        IConstructorResolutionBehavior original)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.original = original;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ConstructorInfo GetConstructor(Type serviceType, Di2015NewLine        Type implementationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (serviceType.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine            serviceType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IOpenType<>))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do alternative constructor selection here for open types.Di2015NewLine            // For instance:Di2015NewLine            return (Di2015NewLine                from ctor in implementationType.GetConstructors()Di2015NewLine                orderby ctor.GetParameters().Length descendingDi2015NewLine                select ctor)Di2015NewLine               .First();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // fall back to default behaviorDi2015NewLine        return original.GetConstructor(serviceType, implementationType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17909731Di2015UniqueSeparatorIConstructorResolutionBehavior
17909731Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegisterOpenGeneric
17909731Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing SimpleInjector;Di2015NewLineusing SimpleInjector.Advanced;Di2015NewLineusing SimpleInjector.Extensions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class OpenGenericConstructorExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void EnableOpenGenericConstructorSelection(Di2015NewLine        this ContainerOptions options)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var selectors = new List<Func<Type, ConstructorInfo>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        options.ConstructorResolutionBehavior = Di2015NewLine            new ConstructorResolutionBehavior(Di2015NewLine                options.ConstructorResolutionBehavior, selectors);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        options.Container.SetItem("selectors", selectors);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RegisterOpenGeneric(this Container container, Di2015NewLine        Type openGenericServiceType,Di2015NewLine        Type openGenericImplementation, Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<object>> constructorSelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var selectors = (List<Func<Type, ConstructorInfo>>)Di2015NewLine            container.GetItem("selectors");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (selectors == null) throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine            "call Options.EnableOpenGenericConstructorSelection first.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var constructor = Di2015NewLine            ((NewExpression)constructorSelector.Body).Constructor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        selectors.Add(type =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (type == openGenericImplementation || (type.IsGenericType && Di2015NewLine                type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == openGenericImplementation))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return GetConstructorForType(type, constructor);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        container.RegisterOpenGeneric(openGenericServiceType, Di2015NewLine            openGenericImplementation);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ConstructorInfo GetConstructorForType(Di2015NewLine        Type closedImplementationType, Di2015NewLine        ConstructorInfo closedConstructor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parameters = closedConstructor.GetParameters();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var constructors =Di2015NewLine            from ctor in closedImplementationType.GetConstructors()Di2015NewLine            where ctor.GetParameters().Length == parameters.LengthDi2015NewLine            let parameterPairs = ctor.GetParameters().Zip(parameters, (p1, p2) =>Di2015NewLine                new { left = p1.ParameterType, right = p2.ParameterType })Di2015NewLine            where parameterPairs.All(pair => pair.left == pair.right ||Di2015NewLine                    (pair.left.IsGenericType && pair.right.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine                    pair.left.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == pair.right.GetGenericTypeDefinition()))Di2015NewLine            select ctor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return constructors.Single();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private sealed class ConstructorResolutionBehavior Di2015NewLine        : IConstructorResolutionBehaviorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly IConstructorResolutionBehavior original;Di2015NewLine        private readonly List<Func<Type, ConstructorInfo>> constructorSelectors;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ConstructorResolutionBehavior(Di2015NewLine            IConstructorResolutionBehavior original,Di2015NewLine            List<Func<Type, ConstructorInfo>> constructorSelectors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.original = original;Di2015NewLine            this.constructorSelectors = constructorSelectors;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ConstructorInfo GetConstructor(Type serviceType, Di2015NewLine            Type implementationType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var constructors =Di2015NewLine                from selector in this.constructorSelectorsDi2015NewLine                let constructor = selector(implementationType)Di2015NewLine                where constructor != nullDi2015NewLine                select constructor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return constructors.FirstOrDefault() ?? Di2015NewLine                this.original.GetConstructor(serviceType, Di2015NewLine                    implementationType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17910951Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TreeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine    public List<Tree> Children = new List<Tree>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Tree Parent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Tree(Tree parent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Parent = parent;Di2015NewLine        Name = rand.Next(10000).ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Removing without tree traversal.Di2015NewLine    public void DeleteParent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Parent.Parent.Children.Remove(this.Parent);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Remove(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int i = Children.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Children[i].Remove(name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Use a for-loop with index to remove the child right away.Di2015NewLine                Children.Remove(Children[i]);Di2015NewLine                // Extra remove handlingDi2015NewLine                i--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove condition.Di2015NewLine        return this.Name.Contains(name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17912051Di2015UniqueSeparator// Note: this will iterate over the sequence twice. It's expected not to changeDi2015NewLine// between iterations!Di2015NewLine// The Random parameter is so that you can use a single instance multiple times.Di2015NewLine// See http://csharpindepth.com/Articles/Chapter12/Random.aspxDi2015NewLineint PickRandomWeightedElement(IEnumerable<int> sequence, Random random)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int totalWeight = sequence.Sum();Di2015NewLine    int weightedPick = random.Next(totalWeight);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in sequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (weightedPick < item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        weightedPick -= item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException("List must have changed...");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17912551Di2015UniqueSeparator[ExtensionExport(IsBatch = true, IsMonitoring = false)]Di2015NewLinepublic AppRecordExtension : BaseExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     // ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17912551Di2015UniqueSeparator[ImportMany]Di2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<Lazy<IExtension, IExtensionMetadata>> operations;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void ExecuteExtensions()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(Lazy(IExtension, IExtensionMetadata> extension in operations) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IExtension decoratedExtension = DecorateExtension(extension);Di2015NewLine        result.Add(decoratedExtension, decoratedExtension.Execute()); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IExtension DecorateExtension(Lazy<IExtension, IExtensionMetadata> exportedExtension)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IExtension ext = exportedExtension.Value;Di2015NewLine    if (exportedExtension.Metadata.IsBatch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ext = new BatchableExtension(ext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (exportedExtension.Metadata.IsMonitoring)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ext = new MonitoringExtension(ext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Other decorating logic...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ext;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17918748Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Application_Error(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Exception exception = Server.GetLastError();Di2015NewLine    Response.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var httpException = exception as HttpException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (httpException != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string action;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (httpException.GetHttpCode())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 404:Di2015NewLine                // page not foundDi2015NewLine                action = "NotFound";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 403:Di2015NewLine                // forbiddenDi2015NewLine                action = "Forbidden";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 500:Di2015NewLine                // server errorDi2015NewLine                action = "HttpError500";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                action = "Unknown";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // clear error on serverDi2015NewLine        Server.ClearError();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Response.Redirect(String.Format("~/Errors/{0}", action));Di2015NewLine    }elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this is my modification, which handles any type of an exception.Di2015NewLine        Response.Redirect(String.Format("~/Errors/Unknown")); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17919393Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MessageItemDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<MessageItem> children = new List<MessageItem>();Di2015NewLine    public List<MessageItem> Children { get { return children; } }Di2015NewLine    public int MessageId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int ReplyMessageId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime PostedDate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Message { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0} ({1}): {2}", MessageId, ReplyMessageId, Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // input dataDi2015NewLine    var cu = CultureInfo.InvariantCulture;Di2015NewLine    var data = new[] {Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 66, ReplyMessageId = 65, Message = "Hello", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/25/2013 10:00:01 AM", cu)},Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 68, ReplyMessageId = 66, Message = "[Reply to Hello]-1", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/25/2013 10:12:23 AM",cu)},Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 72, ReplyMessageId = 66, Message = "[Reply to Hello]-2", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/25/2013 11:12:23 AM",cu)},Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 73, ReplyMessageId = 66, Message = "[Reply to Hello]-3", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/26/2013 9:12:23 AM",cu)},Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 74, ReplyMessageId = 66, Message = "[Reply to Hello]-4", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/25/2013 11:12:12 PM",cu)},Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 75, ReplyMessageId = 68, Message = "[Reply to Hello-1] -1", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/25/2013 11:05:12 AM",cu)},Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 76, ReplyMessageId = 73, Message = "[Reply to Hello-3] -1", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/26/2013 10:10:23 AM",cu)},Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 80, ReplyMessageId = 75, Message = "[Reply to Hello-1-1] -1", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/25/2013 11:45:22 AM",cu)},Di2015NewLine        new MessageItem{ MessageId = 81, ReplyMessageId = 68, Message = "[Reply to Hello-1]-1", PostedDate = DateTime.Parse("6/25/2013 11:45:22 AM",cu)},Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // build the hierarchy, using a parent lookupDi2015NewLine    var ids = data.ToDictionary(x => x.MessageId);Di2015NewLine    List<MessageItem> orphans = new List<MessageItem>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageItem parent;Di2015NewLine        (ids.TryGetValue(item.ReplyMessageId, out parent) ? parent.Children : orphans).Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // write the hierarchy using a stack (to avoid recursion)Di2015NewLine    Stack<MessageItem> pending = new Stack<MessageItem>();Di2015NewLine    // the following looks backwards, but isn't (the stack reverses the order)Di2015NewLine    // personally, I would use => x.PostedDate, but that gives a different orderDi2015NewLine    // (the *correct* order, IMO); this gives the *requested* order; no pointDi2015NewLine    // ordering *after* MessageId, as presumably that is uniqueDi2015NewLine    foreach (var msg in orphans.OrderBy(x => x.MessageId)) pending.Push(msg); Di2015NewLine    while (pending.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var next = pending.Pop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(next);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var msg in next.Children.OrderBy(x => x.MessageId)) pending.Push(msg);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17922463Di2015UniqueSeparator public static long IP2Long(string ip)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       string[] ipBytes;Di2015NewLine       double num = 0;Di2015NewLine       if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ip))Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           ipBytes = ip.Split('.');Di2015NewLine           for (int i = ipBytes.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               num += ((int.Parse(ipBytes[i]) % 256) * Math.Pow(256, (3 - i)));Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       return (long)num;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

17927519Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class LuceneUtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Tuple<string, int>> ClosestTerms(this IndexReader reader, string field, string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return reader.TermsStartingWith(field, text[0].ToString())Di2015NewLine                     .Select(x => new Tuple<string, int>(x, LevenshteinDistance(x, text)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<string> TermsStartingWith(this IndexReader reader, string field, string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var tEnum = reader.Terms(new Term(field, text)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var term = tEnum.Term;Di2015NewLine                if (term == null) yield break;Di2015NewLine                if (term.Field != field) yield break;Di2015NewLine                if (!term.Text.StartsWith(text)) yield break;Di2015NewLine                yield return term.Text;Di2015NewLine            } while (tEnum.Next());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //http://www.dotnetperls.com/levenshteinDi2015NewLine    public static int LevenshteinDistance(string s, string t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = s.Length;Di2015NewLine        int m = t.Length;Di2015NewLine        int[,] d = new int[n + 1, m + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Step 1Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0) return m;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (m == 0) return n;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Step 2Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= n; d[i, 0] = i++) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j <= m; d[0, j] = j++) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Step 3Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Step 4Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Step 5Di2015NewLine                int cost = (t[j - 1] == s[i - 1]) ? 0 : 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Step 6Di2015NewLine                d[i, j] = Math.Min(Di2015NewLine                    Math.Min(d[i - 1, j] + 1, d[i, j - 1] + 1),Di2015NewLine                    d[i - 1, j - 1] + cost);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Step 7Di2015NewLine        return d[n, m];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17931709Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> ForEachCharManualParse(string s, char delim)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> result = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    int tmp = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach(char x in s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(x == delim)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(tmp);Di2015NewLine            tmp = 0;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        else if (x >= '0' && x <= '9')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp = tmp * 10 + x - '0';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Invalid input: " + s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    result.Add(tmp);Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17935278Di2015UniqueSeparator// Acts as a reference to the current value stored in the listDi2015NewLineprivate class BoxedValue<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Value;Di2015NewLine    public BoxedValue(T initialValue) { Value = initialValue; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IObservable<IEnumerable<T>> MergeLatest<T>(this IObservable<IObservable<T>> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.Create<IEnumerable<T>>(obs =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var collection = new PerishableCollection<BoxedValue<T>>();Di2015NewLine        var outerSubscription = new SingleAssignmentDisposable();Di2015NewLine        var subscriptions = new CompositeDisposable(outerSubscription);Di2015NewLine        var innerLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        outerSubscription.Disposable = source.Subscribe(duration =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BoxedValue<T> value = null;Di2015NewLine            var lifetime = new DisposableLifetime(); // essentially a CancellationTokenDi2015NewLine            var subscription = new SingleAssignmentDisposable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            subscriptions.Add(subscription);Di2015NewLine            subscription.Disposable = duration.Synchronize(innerLock)Di2015NewLine                .Subscribe(Di2015NewLine                    x =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            value = new BoxedValue<T>(x);Di2015NewLine                            collection.Add(value, lifetime.Lifetime);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            value.Value = x;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        obs.OnNext(collection.CurrentItems().Select(p => p.Value.Value));Di2015NewLine                    },Di2015NewLine                    obs.OnError, // handle an error in the stream.Di2015NewLine                    () => // on completeDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (value != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            lifetime.Dispose(); // removes the itemDi2015NewLine                            obs.OnNext(collection.CurrentItems().Select(p => p.Value.Value));Di2015NewLine                            subscriptions.Remove(subscription); // remove this subscriptionDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return subscriptions;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17935922Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class JavaUtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Dictionary<K, V> ToDictionary<K, V>(this java.util.Map map)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dict = new Dictionary<K, V>();Di2015NewLine        var iterator = map.keySet().iterator();Di2015NewLine        while (iterator.hasNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var key = (K)iterator.next();Di2015NewLine            dict.Add(key, (V)map.get(key));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return dict;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17935946Di2015UniqueSeparator        public struct RectangleFDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float w = 0;Di2015NewLine        float h = 0;Di2015NewLine        float x = 0;Di2015NewLine        float y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public float HeightDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return h; }Di2015NewLine            set { h = value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //put Width, X, and Y properties hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public RectangleF(float width, float height, float X, float Y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            w = width;Di2015NewLine            h = height;Di2015NewLine            x = X;Di2015NewLine            y = Y;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Intersects(Rectangle refRectangle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)x, (int)y, (int)w, (int)h);Di2015NewLine            if (rec.Intersects(refRectangle)) return true;Di2015NewLine            else return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17936065Di2015UniqueSeparatorHKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Installer\\UpgradeCodesDi2015NewLine
17936065Di2015UniqueSeparatorGuid
17936065Di2015UniqueSeparatorGuid
17936065Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class RegistryHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string UpgradeCodeRegistryKey = @"SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Installer\\UpgradeCodes";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly int[] GuidRegistryFormatPattern = new[] { 8, 4, 4, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Guid? GetUpgradeCode(Guid productCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Convert the product code to the format found in the registryDi2015NewLine        var productCodeSearchString = ConvertToRegistryFormat(productCode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Open the upgrade code registry keyDi2015NewLine        var upgradeCodeRegistryRoot = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey(UpgradeCodeRegistryKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (upgradeCodeRegistryRoot == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Iterate over each sub-keyDi2015NewLine        foreach (var subKeyName in upgradeCodeRegistryRoot.GetSubKeyNames())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var subkey = upgradeCodeRegistryRoot.OpenSubKey(subKeyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (subkey == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check for a value containing the product codeDi2015NewLine            if (subkey.GetValueNames().Any(s => s.IndexOf(productCodeSearchString, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) >= 0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Extract the name of the subkey from the qualified nameDi2015NewLine                var formattedUpgradeCode = subkey.Name.Split('\\\\').LastOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Convert it back to a GuidDi2015NewLine                return ConvertFromRegistryFormat(formattedUpgradeCode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string ConvertToRegistryFormat(Guid productCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Reverse(productCode, GuidRegistryFormatPattern);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Guid ConvertFromRegistryFormat(string upgradeCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (upgradeCode == null || upgradeCode.Length != 32)Di2015NewLine            throw new FormatException("Product code was in an invalid format");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        upgradeCode = Reverse(upgradeCode, GuidRegistryFormatPattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Guid.Parse(upgradeCode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string Reverse(object value, params int[] pattern)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Strip the hyphensDi2015NewLine        var inputString = value.ToString().Replace("-", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var returnString = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var index = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Iterate over the reversal patternDi2015NewLine        foreach (var length in pattern)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Reverse the sub-string and append itDi2015NewLine            returnString.Append(inputString.Substring(index, length).Reverse().ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Increment our posistion in the stringDi2015NewLine            index += length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returnString.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17936396Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Fill(Di2015NewLine    int startRecord,Di2015NewLine    int maxRecords,Di2015NewLine    params DataTable[] dataTablesDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine
17936396Di2015UniqueSeparator        const string fileName = "myData.xlsx";Di2015NewLine        const string excelConnString = "provider=Microsoft.ACE.OLEDB.12.0;Data Source='" + fileName + "';Extended Properties=Excel 12.0;";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var cnn = new OleDbConnection(excelConnString))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cnn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const string countQuery = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [Detail$]";Di2015NewLine            using (var cmd = new OleDbCommand(countQuery, cnn))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var reader = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (reader == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    reader.Read();Di2015NewLine                    var rowsCount = ((int)reader[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    const string query = "SELECT * FROM [Detail$]";Di2015NewLine                    using (var odp = new OleDbDataAdapter(query, cnn))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var detailTable = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine                        var recordToStartFetchFrom = 0; //zero-based record number to start with.Di2015NewLine                        const int chunkSize = 100;Di2015NewLine                        while (recordToStartFetchFrom <= rowsCount)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            var diff = rowsCount - recordToStartFetchFrom;Di2015NewLine                            int internalChunkSize = diff < 100 ? diff : chunkSize;Di2015NewLine                            odp.Fill(recordToStartFetchFrom, internalChunkSize, detailTable);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            foreach (DataRow row in detailTable.Rows)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                Console.WriteLine("{1} {0}", row.ItemArray[0], row.ItemArray[1]);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("--------- {0}-{1} Rows Processed ---------", recordToStartFetchFrom, recordToStartFetchFrom + internalChunkSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            recordToStartFetchFrom += chunkSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            detailTable.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                            detailTable = null;Di2015NewLine                            detailTable = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17936700Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void ExtractFileResource(string resource_name, string file_name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (File.Exists(file_name))Di2015NewLine                File.Delete(file_name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!Directory.Exists(Path.GetDirectoryName(file_name)))Di2015NewLine                Directory.CreateDirectory(Path.GetDirectoryName(file_name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Stream sfile = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetManifestResourceStream(resource_name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] buf = new byte[sfile.Length];Di2015NewLine                sfile.Read(buf, 0, Convert.ToInt32(sfile.Length));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (FileStream fs = File.Create(file_name))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    fs.Write(buf, 0, Convert.ToInt32(sfile.Length));Di2015NewLine                    fs.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(string.Format("Can't extract resource '{0}' to file '{1}': {2}", resource_name, file_name, ex.Message), ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17943333Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void MarkAs(User user, UserAddress address, User.AddressType type) {Di2015NewLine        if (context.Entry(user).State == EntityState.Detached) {Di2015NewLine            // clear navigation properties before attaching the entityDi2015NewLine            user.DefaultInvoiceAddress = null;Di2015NewLine            user.DefaultDeliveryAddress = null;Di2015NewLine            context.Users.Attach(user);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // address doesn't have to be attachedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (type.HasFlag(User.AddressType.DefaultInvoice)) {Di2015NewLine            // previously I tried to clear the navigation property hereDi2015NewLine            user.DefaultInvoiceAddressId = address.Id;Di2015NewLine            context.Entry(user).Property(u => u.DefaultInvoiceAddressId).IsModified = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (type.HasFlag(User.AddressType.DefaultDelivery)) {Di2015NewLine            user.DefaultDeliveryAddressId = address.Id;Di2015NewLine            context.Entry(user).Property(u => u.DefaultDeliveryAddressId).IsModified = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17945774Di2015UniqueSeparatorBecause it might dramatically affect Windows Installer's File Costing, the temporaryDi2015NewLinerows must be written before the CostInitialize standard action. Unfortunately, MSI Di2015NewLinedoesn't create properties for the Directory hierarchy in your package until later, in Di2015NewLinethe CostFinalize action.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineAn easy workaround for a typical use case of removing a folder during uninstall is to Di2015NewLinewrite the directory path to the registry and to load it during uninstall.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIf you use custom actions to set properties, ensure that they are scheduled before the Di2015NewLineWixRemoveFoldersEx custom action.Di2015NewLine

17952131Di2015UniqueSeparator-- do the insert into the first tableDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO dbo.YourTableOne(Col1, Col2, ...., ColN)Di2015NewLineVALUES (Val1, Val2, ...., ValN)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @NewID INTDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- get the newly inserted ID for future useDi2015NewLineSELECT @NewID = SCOPE_IDENTITY()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- insert into the second table, use first table's new ID for your FK columnDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO dbo.YourTableTwo (FKColumn, ......) VALUES(@NewID, ......)Di2015NewLine

17953282Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SinGeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates a valid 9-digit SIN.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public int[] GetValidSin()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] s = GenerateSin();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (!SinIsValid(s))Di2015NewLine            s = GenerateSin();  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates a potential SIN. Not guaranteed to be valid.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private int[] GenerateSin()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] s = new int[9];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine            s[i] = r.Next(0, 10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Validates a 9-digit SIN.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private bool SinIsValid(int[] sin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sin.Length != 9)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int checkSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < sin.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int m = (i % 2) + 1;Di2015NewLine            int v = sin[i] * m;Di2015NewLine            if (v > 10)Di2015NewLine                checkSum += 1 + (v - 10);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                checkSum += v;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return checkSum % 10 == 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17954720Di2015UniqueSeparator// Option 1, a Property Bag (Note: this replaces the properties on the classes)Di2015NewLineclass AssetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, object> myPropertyBag = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T GetProperty<T>(string property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This throws if the property doesn't existDi2015NewLine        return (T)myPropertyBag[property];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SetProperty<T>(string property, T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This adds the property if it doesn't existDi2015NewLine        myPropertyBag[property] = (object)value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Option 2, use a switch and override this function in derived classesDi2015NewLineclass AssetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int SomePropertyOnAsset { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual T GetProperty<T>(string property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "SomePropertyOnAsset": return this.SomePropertyOnAsset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default: throw new ArgumentException("property");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual void SetProperty<T>(string property, T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "SomePropertyOnAsset": this.SomePropertyOnAsset = (int)value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default: throw new ArgumentException("property");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass House : AssetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Rooms { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual T GetProperty<T>(string property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "Rooms": return this.Rooms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default: return base.GetProperty<T>(property);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual void SetProperty<T>(string property, T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "Rooms": this.Rooms = (int)value; Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default: base.SetProperty<T>(property, value);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        X509Certificate2 cert = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var kpgen = new RsaKeyPairGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 17965881Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar myMethodM =Di2015NewLine    // Get all the M methodsDi2015NewLine    from mi in typeof(C).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine    where mi.Name == "M"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // that are generic with one type parameterDi2015NewLine    where mi.IsGenericMethodDi2015NewLine    where mi.GetGenericArguments().Length == 1Di2015NewLine    let methodTypeParameter = mi.GetGenericArguments()[0]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // that have two formal parametersDi2015NewLine    let ps = mi.GetParameters()Di2015NewLine    where ps.Length == 2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the first of which is IEnumerable<the method type parameter>Di2015NewLine    where ps[0].ParameterType.IsGenericTypeDi2015NewLine    where ps[0].ParameterType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IEnumerable<>)Di2015NewLine    where ps[0].ParameterType.GetGenericArguments()[0] == methodTypeParameterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the second of which is ref <the method type parameter>Di2015NewLine    where ps[1].ParameterType.IsByRefDi2015NewLine    where ps[1].ParameterType.GetElementType() == methodTypeParameterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    select mi;Di2015NewLine

17967191Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string ReadFromSerial()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.IO.Ports.SerialPort Serial1 = new System.IO.Ports.SerialPort("COM1", 9600, System.IO.Ports.Parity.None, 8, System.IO.Ports.StopBits.One);Di2015NewLine        Serial1.DtrEnable = true;Di2015NewLine        Serial1.RtsEnable = true;Di2015NewLine        Serial1.ReadTimeout = 3000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var MessageBufferRequest = new byte[8] { 1, 3, 0, 28, 0, 1, 69, 204 };Di2015NewLine        var MessageBufferReply = new byte[8] { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };Di2015NewLine        int BufferLength = 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!Serial1.IsOpen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Serial1.Open();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Serial1.Write(MessageBufferRequest, 0, BufferLength);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            logEx(ex);Di2015NewLine            return "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Serial1.Read(MessageBufferReply, 0, 7);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return MessageBufferReply[3].ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        logEx(ex);Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17970153Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var input = File.ReadAllText("text.txt");Di2015NewLine        var xmlDocuments = RegexDi2015NewLine            .Matches(input, @"([0-9AMP: ]*>>Response: )")Di2015NewLine            .Cast<Match>()Di2015NewLine            .Select(match =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var currentPosition = match.Index + match.Length;Di2015NewLine                    var nextMatch = match.NextMatch();Di2015NewLine                    if (nextMatch.Success == true)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return input.Substring(currentPosition,Di2015NewLine                            nextMatch.Index - currentPosition);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return input.Substring(currentPosition);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                })Di2015NewLine            .Select(s => XDocument.Parse(s))Di2015NewLine            .ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17977321Di2015UniqueSeparator// The PrintPage event is raised for each page to be printed. Di2015NewLineprivate void pd_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs ev)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int row = 0;Di2015NewLine    int col = 0;Di2015NewLine    float xPos = 0;Di2015NewLine    float yPos = 0;Di2015NewLine    float leftMargin = ev.MarginBounds.Left;Di2015NewLine    float topMargin = ev.MarginBounds.Top;Di2015NewLine    string line = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Print each line of the file. Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            row = Convert.ToInt32(streamToPrint.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine            col = Convert.ToInt32(streamToPrint.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine            line = streamToPrint.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        xPos = leftMargin + (col * ev.Graphics.MeasureString(" ", printFont, ev.PageBounds.Width));Di2015NewLine        yPos = topMargin + (row * printFont.GetHeight(ev.Graphics));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ev.Graphics.DrawString(line, printFont, Brushes.Black, xPos, yPos, new StringFormat());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17977375Di2015UniqueSeparatorGroupBy
17977375Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TResult> ZipMany<TSource, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<IEnumerable<TSource>> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<IEnumerable<TSource>, TResult> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // ToList is necessary to avoid deferred executionDi2015NewLine   var enumerators = source.Select(seq => seq.GetEnumerator()).ToList();Di2015NewLine   while (true)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       foreach (var e in enumerators)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           bool b = e.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine           if (!b) yield break;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       // Again, ToList (or ToArray) is necessary to avoid deferred executionDi2015NewLine       yield return selector(enumerators.Select(e => e.Current).ToList());Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17977784Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<TModel> Paginate(IQueryable<TModel> source, ref int totalPages, int pageIndex, int pageSize, string sortfield, SortDirection? sortdir)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    totalPages = (int)Math.Ceiling(source.Count() / (double)pageSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (sortdir == SortDirection.Descending)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         return source.OrderByDescending(sortfield).Skip(pageIndex * pageSize).Take(pageSize).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine QueryableHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<TModel> OrderBy<TModel>(this IQueryable<TModel> q, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type entityType = typeof(TModel);Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo p = entityType.GetProperty(name);Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo m = typeof(QueryableHelper).GetMethod("OrderByProperty").MakeGenericMethod(entityType, p.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        return(IQueryable<TModel>) m.Invoke(null, new object[] { q, p });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<TModel> OrderByDescending<TModel>(this IQueryable<TModel> q, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type entityType = typeof(TModel);Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo p = entityType.GetProperty(name);Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo m = typeof(QueryableHelper).GetMethod("OrderByPropertyDescending").MakeGenericMethod(entityType, p.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        return (IQueryable<TModel>)m.Invoke(null, new object[] { q, p });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<TModel> OrderByPropertyDescending<TModel, TRet>(IQueryable<TModel> q, PropertyInfo p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression pe = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TModel));Di2015NewLine        Expression se = Expression.Convert(Expression.Property(pe, p), typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        return q.OrderByDescending(Expression.Lambda<Func<TModel, TRet>>(se, pe));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<TModel> OrderByProperty<TModel, TRet>(IQueryable<TModel> q, PropertyInfo p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression pe = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TModel));Di2015NewLine        Expression se = Expression.Convert(Expression.Property(pe, p), typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        return q.OrderBy(Expression.Lambda<Func<TModel, TRet>>(se, pe));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17979127Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar outputRanges = new List<Range>();Di2015NewLineforeach (var range in inputRanges)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // Let Range.Touches(Range) define a function that returns trueDi2015NewLine   // iff the two ranges overlap at all (that is, A.Start and/or A.EndDi2015NewLine   // is between B.Start and B.End)Di2015NewLine   var overlaps = outputRanges.Where(range.Touches).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // If there are no overlaps, then simply add it to the outputDi2015NewLine   if (!overlaps.Any())Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       outputRanges.Add(range);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   // If there are overlaps, merge themDi2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       outputRanges.RemoveAll(overlaps);Di2015NewLine       overlaps.Add(range);Di2015NewLine       outputRange.Add(new Range() {Di2015NewLine           Start = overlaps.Min(_=>_.Start),Di2015NewLine           End = overlaps.Max(_=>_.End)Di2015NewLine       });Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17979169Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void CreateHandle()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create the render windowDi2015NewLine    mRenderWindow = new RenderWindow(this);Di2015NewLine ...Di2015NewLine        // - Setup swap interval, if supportedDi2015NewLine        mRenderWindow.Create((RenderContext)null);Di2015NewLine        // Create the render context (before event ClientSize.Width, ClientSize.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Derived class implementationDi2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine e.ClipRectangle.Bottom), new Point(e.ClipRectangle.Right, e.ClipRectangle.Top),Di2015NewLine                new Point(e.ClipRectangle.Left, e.ClipRectangle.Top), new Point(e.ClipRectangle.Right, e.ClipRectangle.Bottom),Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Base implementationDi2015NewLine            base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } else e.ClipRectangle.Bottom), new Point(e.ClipRectangle.Right, e.ClipRectangle.Top),Di2015NewLine                new Point(e.ClipRectangle.Left, e.ClipRectangle.Top), new Point(e.ClipRectangle.Right, 17987674Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T[] CreateArray<T>(int size) {Di2015NewLine  if (size < 0)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("size");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  T[] result = new T[size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // You may put any special cases here, e.g. if you want empty strings instead of nullsDi2015NewLine  // uncomment the exerp:Di2015NewLine  //if (typeof(T) == typeof(String)) {Di2015NewLine  //  for (int i = 0; i < result.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine  //    result[i] = (T) ((Object) "");Di2015NewLine  //   Di2015NewLine  //  return result;  Di2015NewLine  //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // If default value is null, instances should be created Di2015NewLine  // (if we manage to find out how to do it)Di2015NewLine  if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, default(T))) {Di2015NewLine    // Do we have a constructor by default (public one and without parameters)?Di2015NewLine    ConstructorInfo ci = typeof(T).GetConstructor(new Type[] { });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If do, let's create instancesDi2015NewLine    if (!Object.ReferenceEquals(null, ci))Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < result.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine        result[i] = (T) (ci.Invoke(new Object[] { }));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17987674Di2015UniqueSeparator  // int is a structore, its default value is 0, so i = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0]Di2015NewLine  int[] i = CreateArray<int>(5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // String has no String() constructor, so s[] = [null, null, null, null, null]Di2015NewLine  String[] s = CreateArray<String>(5); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Button has Button() constructor, so b[] contains buttons Di2015NewLine  Button[] b = CreateArray<Button>(5);Di2015NewLine

17987988Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate type HitBlocks as table (Di2015NewLine    HitIndex int not nullDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLinegoDi2015NewLinecreate procedure FindMaxCoverDi2015NewLine    @Hits HitBlocks readonlyDi2015NewLineasDi2015NewLine    ;With DecomposedBlocks as (Di2015NewLine        select (HitIndex/8)+1 as ByteIndex,POWER(2,(HitIndex%8)) as BitMaskDi2015NewLine        from @HitsDi2015NewLine    ), Coverage as (Di2015NewLine        selectDi2015NewLine            t.TraceName,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(t.BlockVector,db.ByteIndex,1) & BitMask != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as CoverageDi2015NewLine        fromDi2015NewLine            Trace tDi2015NewLine                cross joinDi2015NewLine            DecomposedBlocks dbDi2015NewLine        group byDi2015NewLine            t.TraceNameDi2015NewLine    ), Ranked as (Di2015NewLine        select *,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY Coverage desc) as rkDi2015NewLine        from CoverageDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    selectDi2015NewLine        t.TraceName,Di2015NewLine        t.BlockVector,Di2015NewLine        r.CoverageDi2015NewLine    fromDi2015NewLine        Ranked rDi2015NewLine            inner joinDi2015NewLine        Trace tDi2015NewLine            onDi2015NewLine                r.TraceName = t.TraceNameDi2015NewLine    where rk = 1Di2015NewLine

17989215Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<User> UsersByBirthday(IEnumerable<User> users, DateTime from, DateTime to)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var fromNormalized = NormalizeDate(from);Di2015NewLine    var intoNormalized = NormalizeDate(into);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return users.Where(u => fromNormalized <= NormalizeDate(u.BirthDate) && NormalizeDate(u.BirthDate) <= intoNormalized);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int NormalizeDate(DateTime date)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return date.Month * 100 + date.Day;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17989254Di2015UniqueSeparatordata.Stride
17989254Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void SavePCX(Stream pcxStream, Bitmap bmp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bmp.PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Can only PCX bitmaps that are 1bpp indexed");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var data = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //headerDi2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(10); //    char manufacturer;Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(5); //char version;Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(1); //char encoding;Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(1); // char bpp;Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(0); //char xmin[2];Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(0); //char ymin[2];Di2015NewLine                WriteWord(pcxStream, bmp.Width - 1); // char xmax[2];Di2015NewLine                WriteWord(pcxStream, bmp.Height - 1); //char ymax[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                WriteWord(pcxStream, 72); //word(pcx->hdpi, 72);Di2015NewLine                WriteWord(pcxStream, 72); // word(pcx->vdpi, 72);Di2015NewLine                for (var i = 0; i < 16*3; i++) //4bpp paletteDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pcxStream.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(0); // pcx->res = 0;Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(1); // pcx->nplanes = 1;Di2015NewLine                WriteWord(pcxStream, data.Stride); // word(pcx->bytesperline, width / 2);Di2015NewLine                WriteWord(pcxStream, 0); //word(pcx->palletteinfo, 0);Di2015NewLine                WriteWord(pcxStream, 0); //word(pcx->hscrn, 0);Di2015NewLine                WriteWord(pcxStream, 0); //word(pcx->vscrn, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (var i = 0; i < 54; i++) //memset(pcx->filler, 0, 54);Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pcxStream.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } //end of headerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //read all bytes to an arrayDi2015NewLine                var baseLine = data.Scan0;Di2015NewLine                // Declare an array to hold the bytes of the bitmap.Di2015NewLine                var byteLength = data.Stride*data.Height;Di2015NewLine                var bytes = new byte[byteLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Copy the RGB values into the array.Di2015NewLine                for (var y = 0; y < data.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var lineOffset = y*data.Stride;Di2015NewLine                    Debug.WriteLine("Y={0}, Offset={1}", y, lineOffset);Di2015NewLine                    for (var x = 0; x < data.Stride; x++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        bytes[y*data.Stride + x] = Marshal.ReadByte(baseLine, lineOffset + x);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var baseIdx = 0;Di2015NewLine                var end = byteLength;Di2015NewLine                var run = 0;Di2015NewLine                var ldata = -1;Di2015NewLine                byte ld;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (baseIdx < end)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //if it matches, increase the run by 1 up to max of 63Di2015NewLine                    if ((bytes[baseIdx] == ldata) && (run < 63)) run++;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //write dataDi2015NewLine                        if (run != 0) //not first runDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ld = (byte) ldata;Di2015NewLine                            if ((run > 1) || (ld >= 0xC0)) pcxStream.WriteByte((byte) (0xC0 | run));Di2015NewLine                            pcxStream.WriteByte(ld);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        run = 1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    ldata = bytes[baseIdx];Di2015NewLine                    baseIdx++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ld = (byte) ((ldata >> 4) | (ldata << 4));Di2015NewLine                if ((run > 1) || (ld >= 0xC0)) pcxStream.WriteByte((byte) (0xC0 | run));Di2015NewLine                pcxStream.WriteByte(ld);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bmp.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17993996Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string prefix = ">";Di2015NewLine        string suffix = ">";Di2015NewLine        string subject =Di2015NewLine            "Subject>memberName1>memberName2>member>Name3>EndSubject";Di2015NewLine        var result = Find(subject, true, prefix, suffix).ToList();Di2015NewLine        result.ForEach(item =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(item);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine        /* The output is:Di2015NewLine        memberName1>memberName2Di2015NewLine        member>Name3                *matchDi2015NewLine        memberName1                 *matchDi2015NewLine        memberName2                 *matchDi2015NewLine        memberDi2015NewLine        Name3Di2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<string> Find(Di2015NewLine        string subject,Di2015NewLine        bool toggle,Di2015NewLine        string prefix,Di2015NewLine        string suffix)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stringDi2015NewLine            r1 = @"(?<=" + prefix + @")(?>([\\w]*(" + prefix +Di2015NewLine            "|" + suffix + @")[\\w]*))(?=" + suffix + ")",Di2015NewLine            r2 = @"[\\w]*";Di2015NewLine        var temp = Regex.Matches(subject, toggle ?Di2015NewLine            r1 : r2Di2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine            .Cast<Match>()Di2015NewLine            .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return temp.SelectMany(m =>Di2015NewLine            tempDi2015NewLine            .Select(i => i.Value)Di2015NewLine            .Union(Find(m.Value, !toggle, prefix, suffix)))Di2015NewLine            .Where(s => !String.IsNullOrEmpty(s))Di2015NewLine            .Distinct();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

AssociatedObject.PreviewKeyDown -= AssociatedObjectPreviewKeyDown;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataObject.RemovePastingHandler(AssociatedObject, Pasting);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Pasting(object sender, DataObjectPastingEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.DataObject.GetDataPresent(typeof(string)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var pastedText = (string)e.DataObject.GetData(typeof(string));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!this.IsValidInput(this.GetText(pastedText)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep.Play();Di2015NewLine                e.CancelCommand();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep.Play();Di2015NewLine            e.CancelCommand();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AssociatedObjectPreviewKeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.Key == Key.Space)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!this.IsValidInput(this.GetText(" ")))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep.Play();Di2015NewLine                e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AssociatedObjectPreviewTextInput(object sender, TextCompositionEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!this.IsValidInput(this.GetText(e.Text)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep.Play();Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string GetText(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var txt = this.AssociatedObject;Di2015NewLine        var realtext = txt.Text.Remove(txt.SelectionStart, txt.SelectionLength);Di2015NewLine        var newtext = realtext.Insert(txt.CaretIndex, input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return newtext;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool IsValidInput(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (InputMode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case TextBoxInputMode.None:Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            case TextBoxInputMode.DigitInput:Di2015NewLine                return CheckIsDigit(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case TextBoxInputMode.DecimalInput:Di2015NewLine                decimal d;Di2015NewLine                //wen mehr als ein KommaDi2015NewLine                if (input.ToCharArray().Where(x => x == ',').Count() > 1)Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (input.Contains("-"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //minus einmal am anfang zulässigDi2015NewLine                    if (!this.JustPositivDecimalInput && input.IndexOf("-") == 0  && input.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var result = decimal.TryParse(input, validNumberStyles, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, out d);Di2015NewLine                        return result;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var result = decimal.TryParse(input, validNumberStyles, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, out d);Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default: throw new ArgumentException("Unknown TextBoxInputMode");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool CheckIsDigit(string wert)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return wert.ToCharArray().All(Char.IsDigit);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum TextBoxInputModeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    None,Di2015NewLine 17995719Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION dbo.Split (@sep char(1), @s varchar(1024))Di2015NewLineRETURNS tableDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineRETURN (Di2015NewLine    WITH Pieces(pn, start, stop) AS (Di2015NewLine      SELECT 1, 1, CHARINDEX(@sep, @s)Di2015NewLine      UNION ALLDi2015NewLine      SELECT pn + 1, stop + 1, CHARINDEX(@sep, @s, stop + 1)Di2015NewLine      FROM PiecesDi2015NewLine      WHERE stop > 0Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    SELECT Di2015NewLine        CAST(SUBSTRING(@s, start, Di2015NewLine            CASE Di2015NewLine                WHEN stop > 0 THEN stop-start Di2015NewLine                ELSE 512 Di2015NewLine            END) as int) AS sDi2015NewLine    FROM PiecesDi2015NewLine  )Di2015NewLine  GODi2015NewLine

17996663Di2015UniqueSeparator    public override bool TableExists(string tableName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var connection = GetConnection(true);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var command = GetNewCommandObject())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                command.Transaction = CurrentTransaction as SqlCeTransaction;Di2015NewLine                command.Connection = connection;Di2015NewLine                var sql = string.Format("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = '{0}'", tableName);Di2015NewLine                command.CommandText = sql;Di2015NewLine                var count = Convert.ToInt32(command.ExecuteScalar());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return (count > 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DoneWithConnection(connection, true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17996663Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected virtual IDbConnection GetConnection(bool maintenance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (ConnectionBehavior)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ConnectionBehavior.AlwaysNew:Di2015NewLine                var connection = GetNewConnectionObject();Di2015NewLine                connection.Open();Di2015NewLine                return connection;Di2015NewLine            case ConnectionBehavior.HoldMaintenance:Di2015NewLine                if (m_connection == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_connection = GetNewConnectionObject();Di2015NewLine                    m_connection.Open();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (maintenance) return m_connection;Di2015NewLine                var connection2 = GetNewConnectionObject();Di2015NewLine                connection2.Open();Di2015NewLine                return connection2;Di2015NewLine            case ConnectionBehavior.Persistent:Di2015NewLine                if (m_connection == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_connection = GetNewConnectionObject();Di2015NewLine                    m_connection.Open();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return m_connection;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void DoneWithConnection(IDbConnection connection, bool maintenance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (ConnectionBehavior)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ConnectionBehavior.AlwaysNew:Di2015NewLine                connection.Close();Di2015NewLine                connection.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConnectionBehavior.HoldMaintenance:Di2015NewLine                if (maintenance) return;Di2015NewLine                connection.Close();Di2015NewLine                connection.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConnectionBehavior.Persistent:Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17996692Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringBuilder
17996692Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int BufferSize = 4096;Di2015NewLineconst string newline = "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var strm = new StreamReader(....))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int newlineIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    var buffer = new char[BufferSize];Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    int charsInBuffer = 0;Di2015NewLine    int bufferIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    char lastChar = (char)-1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (!(strm.EndOfStream && bufferIndex >= charsInBuffer))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bufferIndex > charsInBuffer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            charsInBuffer = strm.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            if (charsInBuffer == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // nothing read. Must be at end of stream.Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            bufferIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (buffer[bufferIndex] == newline[newlineIndex])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++newlineIndex;Di2015NewLine            if (newlineIndex == newline.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // found a lineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine                newlineIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine                sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (newlineIndex > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // copy matched newline charactersDi2015NewLine                sb.Append(newline.Substring(0, newlineIndex));Di2015NewLine                newlineIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(buffer[bufferIndex]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ++bufferIndex;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Might be a line left, without a newlineDi2015NewLine    if (newlineIndex > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(newline.Substring(0, newlineIndex));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (sb.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17997911Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct Item1 { public double Foo { get; set; } }Di2015NewLinestruct Item2 { public double Foo { get; set; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Item1 i1 = new Item1();Di2015NewLine        CopyDynamically(new Item2 { Foo = 42 }, ref i1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(i1.Foo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        i1 = CopyDynamically<Item1>(new Item2 { Foo = 3.14 });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(i1.Foo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void CopyDynamically<T>(object source, ref T target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine        if (target == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("target");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo pi in source.GetType().GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo targetPi = typeof(T).GetProperty(pi.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (targetPi != null && targetPi.SetMethod != null && targetPi.SetMethod.IsPublic)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object val = pi.GetValue(source, null);Di2015NewLine                object o = target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                try { targetPi.SetValue(o, val, null); }Di2015NewLine                catch { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                target = (T)o;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static T CopyDynamically<T>(object source, params object[] ctorArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T target = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(T), ctorArgs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CopyDynamically(source, ref target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17998929Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class VerticalArrow : UserControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public VerticalArrow()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        Direction = ArrowDirection.Up;                       Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public enum ArrowDirectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Up,Di2015NewLine        DownDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ArrowDirection dir;Di2015NewLine    public ArrowDirection DirectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return dir; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (dir != value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dir = value;Di2015NewLine                UpdateRegion();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //default values of ArrowWidth and ArrowHeightDi2015NewLine    int arrowWidth = 14;Di2015NewLine    int arrowHeight = 18;Di2015NewLine    public int ArrowWidthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return arrowWidth; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (arrowWidth != value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                arrowWidth = value;Di2015NewLine                UpdateRegion();                    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int ArrowHeightDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return arrowHeight; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (arrowHeight != value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                arrowHeight = value;Di2015NewLine                UpdateRegion();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //This will keep the size of the UserControl fixed at design time.Di2015NewLine    protected override void SetBoundsCore(int x, int y, int width, int height, BoundsSpecified specified)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.SetBoundsCore(x, y, Math.Max(ArrowWidth, 4), height, specified);Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine    private void UpdateRegion()Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        GraphicsPath gp = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine        int dx = ArrowWidth / 2 - 1;Di2015NewLine        int dy = ArrowHeight / 2;Di2015NewLine        Point p1 = new Point(dx, Direction == ArrowDirection.Up ? dy : 1);Di2015NewLine        Point p2 = new Point(ArrowWidth - dx, Direction == ArrowDirection.Up ? dy + 1: 1);Di2015NewLine        Point p3 = new Point(ArrowWidth - dx, Direction == ArrowDirection.Up ? ClientSize.Height : ClientSize.Height - dy);Di2015NewLine        Point p4 = new Point(dx, Direction == ArrowDirection.Up ? ClientSize.Height : ClientSize.Height - dy);Di2015NewLine        Point q1 = Direction == ArrowDirection.Up ? new Point(0, ArrowHeight) : new Point(0, ClientSize.Height - ArrowHeight);Di2015NewLine        Point q2 = Direction == ArrowDirection.Up ? new Point(dx, 0) : new Point(dx, ClientSize.Height);Di2015NewLine        Point q3 = Direction == ArrowDirection.Up ? new Point(ArrowWidth, ArrowHeight) : new Point(ArrowWidth, ClientSize.Height - ArrowHeight);Di2015NewLine        if (Direction == ArrowDirection.Up) gp.AddPolygon(new Point[] { p1, q1, q2, q3, p2, p3, p4 });Di2015NewLine        else gp.AddPolygon(new Point[] {p1,p2,p3,q3,q2,q1,p4});Di2015NewLine        Region = new Region(gp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnSizeChanged(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UpdateRegion();Di2015NewLine        base.OnSizeChanged(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
