18001794Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void processImport()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] fields;Di2015NewLine    string field ;Di2015NewLine    string temp = "";Di2015NewLine    byte[] tempByte;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TextFieldParser parser = new TextFieldParser(textbox_csv.Text, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8);Di2015NewLine    parser.TextFieldType = FieldType.Delimited;Di2015NewLine    parser.SetDelimiters(";");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (!parser.EndOfData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fields = parser.ReadFields();Di2015NewLine        field = fields[0];Di2015NewLine        temp = RemoveDiacritics(field).ToUpper();Di2015NewLine        //this line is very important. It seems to change the Encoding of my string to Unicode.Di2015NewLine        temp = temp.Normalize(NormalizationForm.FormC);Di2015NewLine        field = myVbDll.MyWrappedFunction(temp, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    parser.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Transforms the culture of a letter to its equivalent representation in the 0-127 ascii table, such as the letter 'é' is substituted by an 'e'Di2015NewLinepublic string RemoveDiacritics(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string normalizedString = null;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder stringBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    normalizedString = s.Normalize(NormalizationForm.FormD);Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    char c = '\\0';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i <= normalizedString.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        c = normalizedString[i];Di2015NewLine        if (CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory(c) != UnicodeCategory.NonSpacingMark)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stringBuilder.Append(c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return stringBuilder.ToString().ToLower();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18001794Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Class myVbDllDi2015NewLine    <DllImport("Wrapper.dll", CharSet:=CharSet.Unicode)> Public Shared Function MyWrappedFunction (ByVal nom As String, ByVal opt As Boolean) As StringDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine
18001794Di2015UniqueSeparatortypedef void (*MYFUNCTION)(CString&, CString&, BYTE);Di2015NewLineMYFUNCTION Myfunction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineLPWSTR _stdcall MyWrappedFunction(LPWSTR ValInput, BYTE opt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HINSTANCE gLibtestDLL=NULL;Di2015NewLine    CString S_ValInput(ValInput);Di2015NewLine    CString S_resultat;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    gLibtestDLL = AfxLoadLibrary(TEXT(".\\\\test.dll"));Di2015NewLine    if(gLibtestDLL == NULL)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox(NULL, TEXT("unable to load test.DLL"), TEXT("Error"),MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION);Di2015NewLine        return NULL;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Myfunction = (MYFUNCTION)GetProcAddress(gLibtestDLL, "Myfunction");Di2015NewLine    if (Myfunction == NULL)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox(NULL, TEXT("Can't find Myfunction."), TEXT("Error"),MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return NULL;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //******************************************************************Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    S_resultat.Format("%64c", ' ');Di2015NewLine    Myfunction(S_ValInput , S_resultat , opt);  //Run MFC functionDi2015NewLine    S_resultat.TrimRight();Di2015NewLine    S_resultat.ReleaseBuffer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char* tmp = (char*) CoTaskMemAlloc((S_resultat.GetLength()*2)+1);Di2015NewLine    memset(tmp,0,sizeof(tmp));Di2015NewLine    strcpy_s(tmp, (S_resultat.GetLength()+1), S_resultat.GetBuffer(S_resultat.GetLength()));Di2015NewLine    S_resultat.ReleaseBuffer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    wchar_t wtext[1024];Di2015NewLine    memset(wtext,0,sizeof(wtext));Di2015NewLine    mbstowcs(wtext, tmp, strlen(tmp)+1);//Plus \\0Di2015NewLine    LPWSTR resultat = wtext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    AfxFreeLibrary(gLibtestDLL);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return resultat;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18005149Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT [UnionAll1].[pkey] AS [C1], Di2015NewLine       [UnionAll1].[region] AS [C2], Di2015NewLine       [UnionAll1].[product_type] AS [C3], Di2015NewLine       [UnionAll1].[product_size] AS [C4]Di2015NewLineFROM (SELECT [Extent1].[pkey] AS [pkey], Di2015NewLine             [Extent1].[region] AS [region], Di2015NewLine             [Extent1].[product_type] AS [product_type], Di2015NewLine             [Extent1].[product_size] AS [product_size]Di2015NewLine      FROM [dbo].[Prices] AS [Extent1] WHERE 17 = [Extent1].[region]Di2015NewLineUNION ALLDi2015NewLine   SELECT [Extent4].[pkey] AS [pkey], Di2015NewLine          [Extent4].[region] AS [region], Di2015NewLine          [Extent4].[product_type] AS [product_type], Di2015NewLine          [Extent4].[product_size] AS [product_size]Di2015NewLine   FROM (SELECT DISTINCT [Extent2].[product_type] AS [product_type], Di2015NewLine                         [Extent2].[product_size] AS [product_size]Di2015NewLine         FROM [dbo].[Prices] AS [Extent2]Di2015NewLine         WHERE ([Extent2].[region] = 17 OR [Extent2].[region] IS NULL) AND Di2015NewLine               (NOT EXISTS Di2015NewLine                (SELECT 1 AS [C1] FROM [dbo].[Prices] AS [Extent3]Di2015NewLine                 WHERE ([Extent3].[region] = 17 OR [Extent3].[region] IS NULL)Di2015NewLine                       AND ([Extent2].[product_type] = [Extent3].[product_type])Di2015NewLine                       AND ([Extent2].[product_size] = [Extent3].[product_size])Di2015NewLine                       AND (17 = [Extent3].[region])Di2015NewLine                 ))) AS [Distinct1]Di2015NewLine   INNER JOIN [dbo].[Prices] AS [Extent4] Di2015NewLine       ON ([Extent4].[region] = 17 OR [Extent4].[region] IS NULL)Di2015NewLine          AND ([Distinct1].[product_type] = [Extent4].[product_type])Di2015NewLine          AND ([Distinct1].[product_size] = [Extent4].[product_size]))Di2015NewLine   AS [UnionAll1]Di2015NewLine

18012067Di2015UniqueSeparator^                      # Start of stringDi2015NewLine(?=.{1,254}$)          # Assert length of string: 1-254 charactersDi2015NewLine(                      # Match the following group (domain name segment):Di2015NewLine (?=[a-z0-9-]{1,63}\\.) # Assert length of group: 1-63 charactersDi2015NewLine (xn--)?               # Allow punycode notationDi2015NewLine [a-z0-9]+             # Match letters/digitsDi2015NewLine (-[a-z0-9]+)*         # optionally followed by dash-separated letters/digitsDi2015NewLine \\.                    # followed by a dot.Di2015NewLine)+                     # Repeat this as needed (at least one match is required)Di2015NewLine[a-z]{2,63}            # Match the TLD (at least 2 characters)Di2015NewLine$                      # End of stringDi2015NewLine

18013613Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] GetBytesWithMarshaling(Bitmap bitmap)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int height = bitmap.Height;Di2015NewLine    int width = bitmap.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb => B|G|R => 3 x 1 byteDi2015NewLine    //Lock the imageDi2015NewLine    BitmapData bmpData = bitmap.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine    // 3 bytes per pixelDi2015NewLine    int numberOfBytes = width * height * 3;Di2015NewLine    byte[] imageBytes = new byte[numberOfBytes];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the pointer to the first scan lineDi2015NewLine    IntPtr sourcePtr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine    Marshal.Copy(sourcePtr, imageBytes, 0, numberOfBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Unlock the imageDi2015NewLine    bitmap.UnlockBits(bmpData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return imageBytes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18015599Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static TextPointer GetTextPointAt(TextPointer from, int pos)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    TextPointer ret = from;Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while ((i < pos) && (ret != null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((ret.GetPointerContext(LogicalDirection.Backward) == TextPointerContext.Text) || (ret.GetPointerContext(LogicalDirection.Backward) == TextPointerContext.None))Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ret.GetPositionAtOffset(1, LogicalDirection.Forward) == null)Di2015NewLine            return ret;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ret = ret.GetPositionAtOffset(1, LogicalDirection.Forward);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine internal string Select(RichTextBox rtb, int offset, int length, Color color)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    // Get text selection:Di2015NewLine    TextSelection textRange = rtb.Selection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get text starting point:Di2015NewLine    TextPointer start = rtb.Document.ContentStart;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get begin and end requested:Di2015NewLine    TextPointer startPos = GetTextPointAt(start, offset);Di2015NewLine    TextPointer endPos = GetTextPointAt(start, offset + length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // New selection of text:Di2015NewLine    textRange.Select(startPos, endPos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Apply property to the selection:Di2015NewLine    textRange.ApplyPropertyValue(TextElement.BackgroundProperty, new SolidColorBrush(color));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return selection text:Di2015NewLine    return rtb.Selection.Text;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

18015612Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T ChangeType<T>(object value) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (t.IsGenericType && t.GetGenericTypeDefinition().Equals(typeof(Nullable<>))) Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       if (value == null) Di2015NewLine       { Di2015NewLine           return default(T); Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       t = Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(t); ;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return (T)Convert.ChangeType(value, t);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18016448Di2015UniqueSeparator<?phpDi2015NewLine$encb64 = "cJ4ZJD3Vkf3Dv5uxrWiTQg==";Di2015NewLine$pwd = "123";Di2015NewLine$salt = "3";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine$enc = base64_decode($encb64);Di2015NewLine$decpad = Decrypt($enc, $pwd, $salt);Di2015NewLine// Remove the paddingDi2015NewLine$pad = ord($decpad[($len = strlen($decpad)) - 1]);Di2015NewLine$dec = substr($decpad, 0, strlen($decpad) - $pad);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineecho "Enc: " . bin2hex($enc) . "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLineecho "Dec: " . $dec . "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction Decrypt($ciphertext, $password, $salt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  $key = PBKDF1($password, $salt, 100, 32);Di2015NewLine  $iv = PBKDF1($password, $salt, 100, 16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // NB: Need 128 not 256 and CBC mode to be compatibleDi2015NewLine  return mcrypt_decrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $key, $ciphertext, MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $iv);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18016448Di2015UniqueSeparator<?phpDi2015NewLinefunction PBKDF1($pass, $salt, $count, $cb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // This is very approximately the way that the Microsoft version of Di2015NewLine  // PasswordDeriveBytes works.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  ///Di2015NewLine  /// !!!WARNING!!!Di2015NewLine  ///Di2015NewLine  // This is a BAD function!Di2015NewLine  // Irrespective of the fact that the use of PBKDF1 is not recommended anyway.Di2015NewLine  //Di2015NewLine  // This really should be put into a class with a constructor taking the Di2015NewLine  // $pass, $salt and $count.Di2015NewLine  // Then there should be a Reset() method to start from scratch each time a new pwd/salt is used.Di2015NewLine  // And there should be a GetBytes(int) method to get the required info.Di2015NewLine  // But for the sake of simplicity we are assuming the same pwd and salt for each call to Di2015NewLine  // this function. This will not stand up to any scrutiny!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static $base;Di2015NewLine  static $extra;Di2015NewLine  static $extracount= 0;Di2015NewLine  static $hashno;Di2015NewLine  static $state = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if ($state == 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    $hashno = 0;Di2015NewLine    $state = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $key = $pass . $salt;Di2015NewLine    $base = sha1($key, true);Di2015NewLine    for($i = 2; $i < $count; $i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      $base = sha1($base, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  $result = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Check if we have any bytes left over from a previous iteration.Di2015NewLine  // This is the way MS appears to do it. To me it looks very badly wrongDi2015NewLine  // in the line: "$result = substr($extra, $rlen, $rlen);"Di2015NewLine  // I'm sure it should be more like "$result = substr($extra, $extracount, $rlen);"Di2015NewLine  // Mono have provided what looks like a fixed version atDi2015NewLine  // https://github.com/mono/mono/blob/master/mcs/class/corlib/System.Security.Cryptography/PasswordDeriveBytes.csDi2015NewLine  // But I'm no cryptographer so I might be wrong.Di2015NewLine  // But this seems to work for low values of $hashno and seems to workDi2015NewLine  // with C# implementations.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if ($extracount > 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    $rlen = strlen($extra) - $extracount;Di2015NewLine    if ($rlen >= $cb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      $result = substr($extra, $extracount, $cb);Di2015NewLine      if ($rlen > $cb)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        $extracount += $cb;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        $extra = null;Di2015NewLine        $extracount = 0;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return $result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    $result = substr($extra, $rlen, $rlen);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  $current = "";Di2015NewLine  $clen = 0;Di2015NewLine  $remain = $cb - strlen($result);Di2015NewLine  while ($remain > $clen)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if ($hashno == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      $current = sha1($base, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if ($hashno < 1000)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      $n = sprintf("%d", $hashno);Di2015NewLine      $tmp = $n . $base;Di2015NewLine      $current .= sha1($tmp, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    $hashno++;Di2015NewLine    $clen = strlen($current);     Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // $current now holds at least as many bytes as we needDi2015NewLine  $result .= substr($current, 0, $remain);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Save any left over bytes for any future requestsDi2015NewLine  if ($clen > $remain)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    $extra = $current;Di2015NewLine    $extracount = $remain;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return $result; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine?>Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public interface IAbstractClass<out T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool ShouldBeProcessed();Di2015NewLine        T Invoke();Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class OtherClassBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Question { get { return "What is the answer to life, universe, 18023109Di2015UniqueSeparatorUUID.nameUUIDFromBytes(byte[])
18023109Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string NameUUIDFromBytes(byte[] input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MD5 md5 = MD5.Create();Di2015NewLine    byte[] hash = md5.ComputeHash(input);Di2015NewLine    hash[6] &= 0x0f;Di2015NewLine    hash[6] |= 0x30;Di2015NewLine    hash[8] &= 0x3f;Di2015NewLine    hash[8] |= 0x80;Di2015NewLine    string hex = BitConverter.ToString(hash).Replace("-", string.Empty).ToLower();Di2015NewLine    return hex.Insert(8, "-").Insert(13, "-").Insert(18, "-").Insert(23, "-");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18023109Di2015UniqueSeparatorGuid
18023109Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Guid NameGuidFromBytes(byte[] input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MD5 md5 = MD5.Create();Di2015NewLine    byte[] hash = md5.ComputeHash(input);Di2015NewLine    hash[6] &= 0x0f;Di2015NewLine    hash[6] |= 0x30;Di2015NewLine    hash[8] &= 0x3f;Di2015NewLine    hash[8] |= 0x80;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte temp = hash[6];Di2015NewLine    hash[6] = hash[7];Di2015NewLine    hash[7] = temp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    temp = hash[4];Di2015NewLine    hash[4] = hash[5];Di2015NewLine    hash[5] = temp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    temp = hash[0];Di2015NewLine    hash[0] = hash[3];Di2015NewLine    hash[3] = temp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    temp = hash[1];Di2015NewLine    hash[1] = hash[2];Di2015NewLine    hash[2] = temp;Di2015NewLine    return new Guid(hash);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18027088Di2015UniqueSeparatorKeyDown
18027088Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void txtResults_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] words = ((TextBox)sender).Text.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine    string s = sampleWord.Text = words[words.Length - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (e.KeyCode == Keys.OemPeriod)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ShowPopUpList(s);Di2015NewLine        lst.SelectedIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (lst.Visible && e.KeyCode == Keys.Up)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // manipulate the selection on the listbox (move up)Di2015NewLine        if (lst.SelectedIndex > 0) Di2015NewLine            lst.SelectedIndex -= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // eat the keypress so it textbox doesn't get it and move the cursorDi2015NewLine        e.Handled = true; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (lst.Visible && e.KeyCode == Keys.Down)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // manipulate the selection on the listbox (move down)Di2015NewLine        if (lst.SelectedIndex < lst.Items.Count - 1) Di2015NewLine            lst.SelectedIndex += 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // eat the keypress so it textbox doesn't get it and move the cursorDi2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (lst.Visible && e.KeyCode == Keys.Enter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // insert current list box selection into text box and hide the listDi2015NewLine        txtResults.Text += lst.SelectedItem;Di2015NewLine        txtResults.SelectionStart = txtResults.Text.Length;Di2015NewLine        lst.Hide();Di2015NewLine        // eat the keypress to prevent the textbox (and the form) from acting on itDi2015NewLine        e.SuppressKeyPress = true;Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lst.Hide();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18028605Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void RemoveAll<T>(this IList<T> iList, IEnumerable<T> itemsToRemove)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var set = new HashSet<T>(itemsToRemove);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var list = iList as List<T>;Di2015NewLine    if (list == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (i < iList.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (set.Contains(iList[i])) iList.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine            else i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list.RemoveAll(set.Contains);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

0;Di2015NewLine            while (i < iList.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (set.Contains(iList[i])) iList.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine                else 18032714Di2015UniqueSeparator// find needed elements and hook up eventsDi2015NewLineprivate void RenewEvents()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ScrollViewer oldHeaderSV = _headerSV;Di2015NewLine    _headerSV = Parent as ScrollViewer;Di2015NewLine    if (oldHeaderSV != _headerSV)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (oldHeaderSV != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oldHeaderSV.ScrollChanged -= new ScrollChangedEventHandler(OnHeaderScrollChanged);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (_headerSV != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _headerSV.ScrollChanged += new ScrollChangedEventHandler(OnHeaderScrollChanged);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ScrollViewer oldSV = _mainSV; // backup the old valueDi2015NewLine    _mainSV = TemplatedParent as ScrollViewer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (oldSV != _mainSV)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (oldSV != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oldSV.ScrollChanged -= new ScrollChangedEventHandler(OnMasterScrollChanged);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_mainSV != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _mainSV.ScrollChanged += new ScrollChangedEventHandler(OnMasterScrollChanged);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine
18032714Di2015UniqueSeparatorGridViewHeaderRowPresenter

18032714Di2015UniqueSeparatorTemplatedParent
18032714Di2015UniqueSeparatorScrollToHorizontalOffset
18032714Di2015UniqueSeparator// The following two scroll changed methods will not be called recursively and lead to dead loop.Di2015NewLine// When scrolling _masterSV, OnMasterScrollChanged will be called, so _headerSV also scrolledDi2015NewLine// to the same offset. Then, OnHeaderScrollChanged be called, and try to scroll _masterSV, butDi2015NewLine// it's already scrolled to that offset, so OnMasterScrollChanged will not be called.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// When master scroll viewer changed its offset, change header scroll viewer accordinglyDi2015NewLineprivate void OnMasterScrollChanged(object sender, ScrollChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_headerSV != null && _mainSV == e.OriginalSource)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _headerSV.ScrollToHorizontalOffset(e.HorizontalOffset);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// When header scroll viewer changed its offset, change master scroll viewer accordinglyDi2015NewLineprivate void OnHeaderScrollChanged(object sender, ScrollChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_mainSV != null && _headerSV == e.OriginalSource)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _mainSV.ScrollToHorizontalOffset(e.HorizontalOffset);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18034220Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void InsertOrUpdate(Product product) {Di2015NewLine    if (product.Id == default(int)) {Di2015NewLine        context.Products.Add(product);Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        var productInDb = context.Products.Include(p => p.ProductTags)Di2015NewLine            .SingleOrDefault(p => p.Id == product.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (productInDb != null) {Di2015NewLine            // To take changes of scalar properties like Name into account...Di2015NewLine            context.Entry(productInDb).CurrentValues.SetValues(product);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Delete relationshipDi2015NewLine            foreach (var tagInDb in productInDb.ProductTags.ToList())Di2015NewLine                if (!product.ProductTags.Any(t => t.Id == tagInDb.Id))Di2015NewLine                    productInDb.ProductTags.Remove(tagInDb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add relationshipDi2015NewLine            foreach (var tag in product.ProductTags)Di2015NewLine                if (!productInDb.ProductTags.Any(t => t.Id == tag.Id)) {Di2015NewLine                    var tagInDb = context.ProductTags.Find(tag.Id);Di2015NewLine                    if (tagInDb != null)Di2015NewLine                        productInDb.ProductTags.Add(tagInDb);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18035050Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int[,] RotateMatrixCounterClockwise(int[,] oldMatrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[,] newMatrix = new int[oldMatrix.GetLength(1), oldMatrix.GetLength(0)];Di2015NewLine    int newColumn, newRow = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int oldColumn = oldMatrix.GetLength(1) - 1; oldColumn >= 0; oldColumn--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        newColumn = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int oldRow = 0; oldRow < oldMatrix.GetLength(0); oldRow++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            newMatrix[newRow, newColumn] = oldMatrix[oldRow, oldColumn];Di2015NewLine            newColumn++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        newRow++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return newMatrix;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18037651Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ContainsSequence<T>(this IEnumerable<T> outer, Di2015NewLine                                       IEnumerable<T> inner)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var innerCount = inner.Count();Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < outer.Count() - innerCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(outer.Skip(i).Take(innerCount).SequenceEqual(inner))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

18037651Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T>
18037651Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ContainsSequence<T>(this List<T> outer, List<T> inner)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var innerCount = inner.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < outer.Count - innerCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool isMatch = true;Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < innerCount; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!outer[i + x].Equals(inner[x]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                isMatch = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (isMatch) return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18038373Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool AnyJR(this IEnumerable t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var o in t)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool AnyPhonicUK(this IEnumerable t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var e = t.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            return e.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finally {Di2015NewLine            var edisp = e as IDisposable;Di2015NewLine            if (edisp != null)Di2015NewLine                edisp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static long Test_AnyJR(List<int> l, int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {Di2015NewLine            bool any = l.AnyJR();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        return sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static long Test_AnyPhonicUK(List<int> l, int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {Di2015NewLine            bool any = l.AnyPhonicUK();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        return sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<int> { 1, 2, 3, 4 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int N = 10000000;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} iterations using AnyJR took {1} ms.", N, Test_AnyJR(list, N));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} iterations using AnyPhonicUK took {1} ms.", N, Test_AnyPhonicUK(list, N));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18043186Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IObservable<T> ThrottleDistinct<T>(this IObservable<T> source, TimeSpan delay)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.Create(observer =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var notifications = new Subject<IObservable<T>>();Di2015NewLine        var subscription = notifications.Merge().Subscribe(observer);Di2015NewLine        var d = new Dictionary<T, IObserver<T>>();Di2015NewLine        var gate = new object();Di2015NewLine        var sourceSubscription = new SingleAssignmentDisposable();Di2015NewLine        var subscriptions = new CompositeDisposable(subscription, sourceSubscription);Di2015NewLine        sourceSubscription.Disposable = source.Subscribe(value =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           IObserver<T> entry;Di2015NewLine           lock(gate)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine             if (d.TryGetValue(value, out entry))Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine               entry.OnNext(value);Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine             elseDi2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine               var s = new Subject<T>();Di2015NewLine               var o = s.Throttle(delay).FirstAsync().Do(() =>Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                 lock(gate)Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                   d.Remove(value);Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine               });Di2015NewLine               notifications.OnNext(o);Di2015NewLine               d.Add(value, s);Di2015NewLine               s.OnNext(value);Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }, observer.OnError, notifications.OnCompleted);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return subscriptions;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineObservable.FromEventPattern(...)Di2015NewLine    .Select(e => e.EventArgs.FullPath)Di2015NewLine    .ThrottleDistinct(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1))Di2015NewLine    .Subscribe(...);Di2015NewLine

18047595Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine    public partial class App : Application {Di2015NewLine        public App() {Di2015NewLine            if (Debugger.IsAttached) {Di2015NewLine                var def = Debug.Listeners["Default"];Di2015NewLine                Debug.Listeners.Remove(def);Di2015NewLine                Debug.Listeners.Add(new MyListener(def));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private class MyListener : TraceListener {Di2015NewLine            private TraceListener defListener;Di2015NewLine            public MyListener(TraceListener def) { defListener = def; }Di2015NewLine            public override void Write(string message) { defListener.Write(message); }Di2015NewLine            public override void WriteLine(string message) { defListener.WriteLine(message); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public override void Fail(string message, string detailMessage) {Di2015NewLine                base.Fail(message, detailMessage);Di2015NewLine                Debugger.Break();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18048313Di2015UniqueSeparatorExplorer [/n] [/e] [(,)/root,<object>] [/select,<object>]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/n                Opens a new single-pane window for the defaultDi2015NewLine                  selection. This is usually the root of the drive WindowsDi2015NewLine                   is installed on. If the window is already open, aDi2015NewLine                  duplicate opens.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/e                Opens Windows Explorer in its default view.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/root,<object>    Opens a window view of the specified object.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/select,<object>  Opens a window view with the specified folder, file orDi2015NewLine                  application selected.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineExamples:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Example 1:     Explorer /select,C:\\TestDir\\TestApp.exeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Opens a window view with TestApp selected.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Example 2:  Explorer /e,/root,C:\\TestDir\\TestApp.exeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      This opens Explorer with C: expanded and TestApp selected.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Example 3:  Explorer /root,\\\\TestSvr\\TestShareDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Opens a window view of the specified share.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Example 4:  Explorer /root,\\\\TestSvr\\TestShare,select,TestApp.exeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Opens a window view of the specified share with TestApp selected.Di2015NewLine

18048502Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble x = -(source.x - target.x);Di2015NewLinedouble y = (source.y - target.y);Di2015NewLinedouble v = 1440; //m/sDi2015NewLinedouble g = 25; //m/sDi2015NewLinedouble sqrt = (v*v*v*v) - (g*(g*(x*x) + 2*y*(v*v)));Di2015NewLinesqrt = Math.Sqrt(sqrt);Di2015NewLineangleInRadians = Math.Atan(((v*v) + sqrt)/(g*x));Di2015NewLine

18050335Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyTestHandler : DelegatingHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override async Task<HttpResponseMessage> SendAsync(Di2015NewLine                                 HttpRequestMessage request,Di2015NewLine                                     CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var local = request.Properties["MS_IsLocal"] as Lazy<bool>;Di2015NewLine        bool isLocal = local != null && local.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (isLocal)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (request.Headers.GetValues("X-Testing").First().Equals("true"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var dummyPrincipal = new GenericPrincipal(Di2015NewLine                                        new GenericIdentity("dummy", "dummy"),Di2015NewLine                                          new[] { "myrole1" });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.CurrentPrincipal = dummyPrincipal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (HttpContext.Current != null)Di2015NewLine                    HttpContext.Current.User = dummyPrincipal;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return await base.SendAsync(request, cancellationToken);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18051204Di2015UniqueSeparator// These are the different formattings you haveDi2015NewLinepublic enum FormatingsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bold, Italic, Underline, UndefinedDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This will store the current formatDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<Formatings, bool> m_CurrentFormat;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This will store which string translates into which formatDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, Formatings> m_FormatingEncoding;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Init()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_CurrentFormat = new Dictionary<Formatings, bool>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (Formatings format in Enum.GetValues(typeof(Formatings)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_CurrentFormat.Add(format, false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        m_FormatingEncoding = new Dictionary<string, Formatings>Di2015NewLine                                  {{"**", Formatings.Bold}, {"'", Formatings.Italic}, {"\\\\", Formatings.Underline}};Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ParseFormattedText(string p_text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder currentWordBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        int currentIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (currentIndex < p_text.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Formatings currentFormatSymbol;Di2015NewLine            int shift;Di2015NewLine            if (IsFormatSymbol(p_text, currentIndex, out currentFormatSymbol, out shift))Di2015NewLine            {   Di2015NewLine                // This is the current word you need to insert                 Di2015NewLine                string currentWord = currentWordBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // This is the current formatting status --> m_CurrentFormatDi2015NewLine                // This is where you can insert your code and add the word you want to the .docxDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                currentWordBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                currentIndex += shift;Di2015NewLine                m_CurrentFormat[currentFormatSymbol] = !m_CurrentFormat[currentFormatSymbol];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            currentWordBuilder.Append(p_text[currentIndex]);Di2015NewLine            currentIndex++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Checks if the current position is the begining of a format symbolDi2015NewLine    // if true - p_currentFormatSymbol will be the discovered format delimiterDi2015NewLine    // and p_shift will denote it's lengthDi2015NewLine    private bool IsFormatSymbol(string p_text, int p_currentIndex, out Formatings p_currentFormatSymbol, out int p_shift)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is a trivial solution, you can do better if you needDi2015NewLine        string substring = p_text.Substring(p_currentIndex, 2);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var formatString in m_FormatingEncoding.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (substring.StartsWith(formatString))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p_shift = formatString.Length;Di2015NewLine                p_currentFormatSymbol = m_FormatingEncoding[formatString];Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p_shift = -1;Di2015NewLine        p_currentFormatSymbol = Formatings.Undefined;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18051671Di2015UniqueSeparator// ----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLinepublic void TimeRangeSample()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // --- time range 1 ---Di2015NewLine  TimeRange timeRange1 = new TimeRange(Di2015NewLine    new DateTime( 2011, 2, 22, 14, 0, 0 ),Di2015NewLine    new DateTime( 2011, 2, 22, 18, 0, 0 ) );Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange1: " + timeRange1 );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange1: 22.02.2011 14:00:00 - 18:00:00 | 04:00:00Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // --- time range 2 ---Di2015NewLine  TimeRange timeRange2 = new TimeRange(Di2015NewLine    new DateTime( 2011, 2, 22, 15, 0, 0 ),Di2015NewLine    new TimeSpan( 2, 0, 0 ) );Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange2: " + timeRange2 );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange2: 22.02.2011 15:00:00 - 17:00:00 | 02:00:00Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // --- time range 3 ---Di2015NewLine  TimeRange timeRange3 = new TimeRange(Di2015NewLine    new DateTime( 2011, 2, 22, 16, 0, 0 ),Di2015NewLine    new DateTime( 2011, 2, 22, 21, 0, 0 ) );Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange3: " + timeRange3 );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange3: 22.02.2011 16:00:00 - 21:00:00 | 05:00:00Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // --- relation ---Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange1.GetRelation( TimeRange2 ): " +Di2015NewLine                     timeRange1.GetRelation( timeRange2 ) );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange1.GetRelation( TimeRange2 ): EnclosingDi2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange1.GetRelation( TimeRange3 ): " +Di2015NewLine                     timeRange1.GetRelation( timeRange3 ) );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange1.GetRelation( TimeRange3 ): EndInsideDi2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange3.GetRelation( TimeRange2 ): " +Di2015NewLine                     timeRange3.GetRelation( timeRange2 ) );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange3.GetRelation( TimeRange2 ): StartInsideDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // --- intersection ---Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange1.GetIntersection( TimeRange2 ): " +Di2015NewLine                     timeRange1.GetIntersection( timeRange2 ) );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange1.GetIntersection( TimeRange2 ):Di2015NewLine  //             22.02.2011 15:00:00 - 17:00:00 | 02:00:00Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange1.GetIntersection( TimeRange3 ): " +Di2015NewLine                     timeRange1.GetIntersection( timeRange3 ) );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange1.GetIntersection( TimeRange3 ):Di2015NewLine  //             22.02.2011 16:00:00 - 18:00:00 | 02:00:00Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "TimeRange3.GetIntersection( TimeRange2 ): " +Di2015NewLine                     timeRange3.GetIntersection( timeRange2 ) );Di2015NewLine  // > TimeRange3.GetIntersection( TimeRange2 ):Di2015NewLine  //             22.02.2011 16:00:00 - 17:00:00 | 01:00:00Di2015NewLine} // TimeRangeSampleDi2015NewLine

18056176Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegexOptions.ExplicitCapture
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparator<% %>
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparator<% %>
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparatorCapture
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparator( ... )* The outer layer. Any number of captures are possible... So any number of "outside" and "inside" are possibleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine(?<1>((?!<%).)+) The capturing group 1, for the "outside"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine| alternativelyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<% An uncaptured <%Di2015NewLine(?<2>((?!%>).)*) The capturing group 2, for the "inside"Di2015NewLine%> An uncaptured %>Di2015NewLine
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<1> ... ) The name of the group (1)Di2015NewLine
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparator((?!<%).)+ Any character that isn't a < followed by a % (at least one character)Di2015NewLine
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<2> ... ) The name of the group (2)Di2015NewLine
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparator((?!%>).)* Any character that isn't a < followed by a % (can be empty)Di2015NewLine
18056176Di2015UniqueSeparator<%

18058548Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int[] Subtract(int[] array, int value) {Di2015NewLine  if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, array))Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("array");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (value < 0) Di2015NewLine    return Addition(array, -value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int s = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int index = 0;Di2015NewLine  int delta = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int i = array.GetLength(0) - 1; i >= 0; --i) {Di2015NewLine    s += array[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (s > value) {Di2015NewLine      index = i;Di2015NewLine      delta = s - value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Too big a value is subtracted, let's return an empty arrayDi2015NewLine  if ((index <= 0) && (delta <= 0)) // <- (delta <= 0) to prevent [x, ... z, 0] answersDi2015NewLine    return new int[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int[] result = new int[index + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < index; ++i)Di2015NewLine    result[i] = array[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  result[index] = delta;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Maximum possible electrons within orbital; 0 - s1, 1 - s1, 2 - p1, 3 - s2 etc.Di2015NewLine// Double arithmetic progression's here (main quantum number - level, orbital quantum number - s, p, d...)Di2015NewLineprivate static int MaxElectronsCount(int value) {Di2015NewLine  Double n = (-1 + Math.Sqrt(1 + 8.0 * (value + 1))) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int group = (int)(n + 1.0 - 1.0e-8); // <- round up to high limitDi2015NewLine  int shift = group - (group * (group + 1) / 2 - value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return 2 + shift * 4;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Electrons addition Di2015NewLinepublic static int[] Addition(int[] array, int value) {Di2015NewLine  if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, array))Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("array");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (value < 0)Di2015NewLine    return Subtraction(array, -value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  List<int> result = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < array.GetLength(0); ++i)Di2015NewLine    result.Add(array[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int level = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (value > 0) {Di2015NewLine    if (result.Count <= level)Di2015NewLine      result.Add(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int max = MaxElectronsCount(level);Di2015NewLine    int delta = max - result[level];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (delta > value)Di2015NewLine      delta = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (delta > 0) {Di2015NewLine      result[level] = result[level] + delta;Di2015NewLine      value -= delta;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    level += 1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine....  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint[] test1 = Subtract(new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }, 1); // <- [1, 2, 3, 4, 4] Di2015NewLineint[] test2 = Subtract(new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }, 5); // <- [1, 2, 3, 4] Di2015NewLineint[] test3 = Subtract(new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }, 6); // <- [1, 2, 3, 3] Di2015NewLineint[] test4 = Subtract(new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }, 10); // <- [1, 2, 2]Di2015NewLineint[] test5 = Subtract(new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }, 1000); // <- [] Di2015NewLineint[] test6 = Subtract(new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }, -1); // <- [2, 2, 3, 4, 5]Di2015NewLineint[] test7 = Subtract(new int[] { 2, 2 }, 2); // <- [2]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint[] test8 = Addition(new int[] {2, 1}, 16); // <- [2, 2, 6, 2, 6, 1]Di2015NewLine

18059786Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// upload fileDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public async Task<string> UploadedFile(string filename, StreamContent streamContent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((!String.IsNullOrEmpty(filename) & (streamContent != null)) != true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("No filename or streamContent");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 1. 18061953Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ViewModelBase : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Raised when a property on this object has a new valueDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Raises this ViewModels PropertyChanged eventDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="propertyName">Name of the property that has a new value</param>Di2015NewLine    protected void SendPropertyChanged(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendPropertyChanged(new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Raises this ViewModels PropertyChanged eventDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">Arguments detailing the change</param>Di2015NewLine    protected virtual void SendPropertyChanged(PropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = this.PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handler(this, e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SendPropertyChanged<TProperty>(Expression<Func<TProperty>> property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var lambda = (LambdaExpression)property;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemberExpression memberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (lambda.Body is UnaryExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = (UnaryExpression)lambda.Body;Di2015NewLine            memberExpression = (MemberExpression)unaryExpression.Operand;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            memberExpression = (MemberExpression)lambda.Body;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        SendPropertyChanged(memberExpression.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //.Net 4.5? or 4 and BCL included?Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Raises this ViewModels PropertyChanged eventDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="propertyName">Name of the property that has a new value</param>Di2015NewLine    protected void SendPropertyChanged([CallerMemberName]string propertyName = "")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendPropertyChanged(new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18063422Di2015UniqueSeparator    //Sprite TextureDi2015NewLine    Texture2D texture;Di2015NewLine    //A Timer variableDi2015NewLine    float timer = 0f;Di2015NewLine    //The interval (300 milliseconds)Di2015NewLine    float interval = 300f;Di2015NewLine    //Current frame holder (start at 1)Di2015NewLine    int currentFrame = 1;Di2015NewLine    //Width of a single sprite image, not the whole Sprite SheetDi2015NewLine    int spriteWidth = 32;Di2015NewLine    //Height of a single sprite image, not the whole Sprite SheetDi2015NewLine    int spriteHeight = 32;Di2015NewLine    //A rectangle to store which 'frame' is currently being shownDi2015NewLine    Rectangle sourceRect;Di2015NewLine    //The centre of the current 'frame'Di2015NewLine    Vector2 origin;Di2015NewLine

18063422Di2015UniqueSeparatorUpdate()
18063422Di2015UniqueSeparator        //Increase the timer by the number of milliseconds since update was last calledDi2015NewLine        timer += (float)gameTime.ElapsedGameTime.TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine        //Check the timer is more than the chosen intervalDi2015NewLine        if (timer > interval)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Show the next frameDi2015NewLine            currentFrame++;Di2015NewLine            //Reset the timerDi2015NewLine            timer = 0f;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //If we are on the last frame, reset back to the one before the first frame (because currentframe++ is called next so the next frame will be 1!)Di2015NewLine        currentFrame = currentFrame % 2;Di2015NewLine        sourceRect = new Rectangle(currentFrame * spriteWidth, 0, spriteWidth, spriteHeight);Di2015NewLine        origin = new Vector2(sourceRect.Width / 2, sourceRect.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine

18067610Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic List<string> LinesBetween(string path, string start, string end)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var lines = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    var foundStart = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var line in File.ReadLines(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!foundStart && line == start)Di2015NewLine            foundStart = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(foundStart)Di2015NewLine            if (line == end) break;Di2015NewLine            else lines.Add(line);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lines;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18067945Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int BUFFER_SIZE = 1024;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid copy(BinaryReader inStream, BinaryWriter outStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] cache = new byte[BUFFER_SIZE];Di2015NewLine    int readCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    while ((readCount = inStream.Read(cache, 0, BUFFER_SIZE)) != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        outStream.Write(cache, 0, readCount);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18067945Di2015UniqueSeparatorBUFFER_SIZE

18067945Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Boolean Patch(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int BUFFER_SIZE = 512;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // VERY IMPORTANT: The throw operation will cause the stream to remain open the function returns.Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(path, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(fs);Di2015NewLine            BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(fs);Di2015NewLine            if (fs.Length != this.rawdata.Length)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine            byte[] cache = new byte[BUFFER_SIZE];Di2015NewLine            int readCount = 0, location = 0;Di2015NewLine            while ((readCount = br.Read(cache, 0, BUFFER_SIZE)) != 0) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int changeLength = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < readCount; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (cache[j] != rawdata[j + location])Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        changeLength++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (changeLength > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        fs.Position = location + j - changeLength;Di2015NewLine                        bw.Write(rawdata, location + j - changeLength, changeLength);Di2015NewLine                        fs.Position = location + j;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        changeLength = 0;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                location += readCount;Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18071546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task<T> Where<T>(this Task<T> task, Func<T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (task == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("task");Di2015NewLine    if (predicate == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("predicate");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<T>();Di2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith((completed) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (completed.IsFaulted) tcs.TrySetException(completed.Exception.InnerExceptions);Di2015NewLine            else if (completed.IsCanceled) tcs.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (predicate(completed.Result))Di2015NewLine                        tcs.TrySetResult(completed.Result);Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        tcs.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tcs.TrySetException(ex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Task<TResult> Select<T, TResult>(this Task<T> task, Func<T, TResult> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (task == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("task");Di2015NewLine    if (selector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("selector");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<TResult>();Di2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith((completed) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (completed.IsFaulted) tcs.TrySetException(completed.Exception.InnerExceptions);Di2015NewLine        else if (completed.IsCanceled) tcs.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcs.TrySetResult(selector(completed.Result));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18071546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task<T> IfCanceled<T>(this Task<T> task, T defaultValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (task == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("task");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<T>();Di2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith((completed) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (completed.IsFaulted) tcs.TrySetException(completed.Exception.InnerExceptions);Di2015NewLine        else if (completed.IsCanceled) tcs.TrySetResult(defaultValue);Di2015NewLine        else tcs.TrySetResult(completed.Result);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18071546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task<string> DoWorkInSequence()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (from x in Task_FromResult(5)Di2015NewLine            where x != 5Di2015NewLine            from y in Task_FromResult(true)Di2015NewLine            where yDi2015NewLine            select x.ToString() + y.ToString()Di2015NewLine           ).IfCanceled("Nothing");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18071546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Task<string> DoWorkInSequence()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task timer = Task.Factory.StartNewDelayed(200, () => { cts.Cancel(); });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task<int> AlphaTask = Task.FactoryDi2015NewLine        .StartNew(() => 4 )Di2015NewLine        .Where(x => x != 5 && !cts.IsCancellationRequested);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task<bool> BravoTask = AlphaTaskDi2015NewLine        .Then(x => true)Di2015NewLine        .Where(x => x && !cts.IsCancellationRequested);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task<int> DeltaTask = BravoTaskDi2015NewLine        .Then(x => 7)Di2015NewLine        .Where(x => x != 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task<string> final = Task.FactoryDi2015NewLine        .WhenAny(DeltaTask, timer)Di2015NewLine        .ContinueWith(x => !DeltaTask.IsCanceled && DeltaTask.Status == TaskStatus.RanToCompletionDi2015NewLine            ? AlphaTask.Result.ToString() + BravoTask.Result.ToString() + DeltaTask.Result.ToString(): "Nothing");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This is here just for experimentation.  Placing it at different pointsDi2015NewLine    //above will have varying effects on what tasks were cancelled at a given point in time.Di2015NewLine    cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return final;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18074777Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] GetBytesFromStringWithZero(Encoding encoding, string str)Di2015NewLine{        Di2015NewLine    int len = encoding.GetByteCount(str);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Here we leave a "space" for the ending \\0Di2015NewLine    // Note the trick to discover the length of the \\0 in the encoding:Di2015NewLine    // It could be 1 (for Ansi, Utf8, ...), 2 (for Unicode, UnicodeBE), 4 (for UTF32)Di2015NewLine    // We simply ask the encoder how long it would be to encode it :-)Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = new byte[len + encoding.GetByteCount("\\0")];Di2015NewLine    encoding.GetBytes(str, 0, str.Length, bytes, 0);Di2015NewLine    return bytes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIntPtr ptr = Connect(Di2015NewLine                 GetBytesFromStringWithZero(Encoding.Default, "MyMachine"),Di2015NewLine                 GetBytesFromStringWithZero(Encoding.Default, "MyServer"), Di2015NewLine                 true);Di2015NewLine

18077368Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar st = "{op1 == op2, #} && {op3 > op4, 1, 2} && op5 == op6";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar regex = "{.*?}";Di2015NewLinefor (var match = Regex.Match(st, regex); match.Success; match = Regex.Match(st, regex))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var oldString = match.Value; // {op1 == op2, #} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var op = oldString.Split(' ').ToList()[1].Trim(); // == Di2015NewLine    var csv = oldString.Split(',').Select(x => x.Trim()).ToList(); // [0] = "{op1 == op2" [1] = "#}"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var expression = csv[0].Remove(0,1); // op1 == op2Di2015NewLine    csv.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var extension = "_" + String.Join("_", csv);Di2015NewLine    extension = extension.Remove(extension.Length-1); // _#Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var newString = expression.Replace(op, op + extension);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    st = st.Replace(oldString, newString); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18077666Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Shared Function Combinations(start As Integer, level As Integer, arr As Integer()) As IEnumerable(Of Integer)Di2015NewLine    For i As Integer = start To arr.Length - 1Di2015NewLine        If level = 1 ThenDi2015NewLine            yield Return arr(i)Di2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            For Each combination As Integer In Combinations(i + 1, level - 1, arr)Di2015NewLine                yield Return arr(i) * combinationDi2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine
18077666Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Shared Function Combinations(start As Integer, level As Integer, arr As Integer()) As IEnumerable(Of Integer)Di2015NewLine    Dim result As New List(Of Integer)()Di2015NewLine    For i As Integer = start To arr.Length - 1Di2015NewLine        If level = 1 ThenDi2015NewLine            result.Add(arr(i))Di2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            For Each combination As Integer In Combinations(i + 1, level - 1, arr)Di2015NewLine                result.Add(arr(i) * combination)Di2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    Return resultDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

18078342Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rD = new RingDictionary(50);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 75; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rD.Add(i, i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in rD.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} {1}", item, rD[item]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass RingDictionary : OrderedDictionaryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int indexKey;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int _capacity = 0;Di2015NewLine    public int CapacityDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _capacity; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value <= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var errorMessage = typeof(Environment)Di2015NewLine                    .GetMethod(Di2015NewLine                        "GetResourceString",Di2015NewLine                        System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static |Di2015NewLine                        System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic,Di2015NewLine                        null,Di2015NewLine                        new Type[] { typeof(string) },Di2015NewLine                        null)Di2015NewLine                    .Invoke(null, new object[] { Di2015NewLine                        "ArgumentOutOfRange_NegativeCapacity" Di2015NewLine                    }).ToString();Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException(errorMessage);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _capacity = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RingDictionary(int capacity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        indexKey = -1;Di2015NewLine        Capacity = capacity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public new void Add(object key, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        indexKey++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (base.Keys.Count > _capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = base.Keys.Count-1; i >Capacity-1 ; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                base.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (base.Keys.Count == _capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.RemoveAt(indexKey % _capacity);Di2015NewLine            base.Insert(indexKey % _capacity, key, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18079648Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string createTable(string[] cols, string[][] values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(@"\\begin{table}[ht]");Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(@"\\centering");Di2015NewLine    // Assuming four columns.Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(@"\\begin{tabular}{c c c c}");Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(@"\\hline\\hline");Di2015NewLine    // Column headers.Di2015NewLine    bool first = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach (string col in cols)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!first)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(" & ");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(col);Di2015NewLine        first = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(@"\\hline");Di2015NewLine    foreach (string[] rowCells in values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        first = true;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string cell in rowCells)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!first)Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(" & ");Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(cell);Di2015NewLine            first = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine(@" \\\\");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(@"\\hline");Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(@"\\end{tabular}");Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(@"\\end{table}");Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18079745Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TCPServerConnectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event Action<string> DataReceived; // eventDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnRecievedData(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {    Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Socket sock = (Socket)ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine            int nBytesRec = sock.EndReceive(ar);Di2015NewLine            if (nBytesRec > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string sRecieved = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(m_byBuff, 0, nBytesRec);Di2015NewLine                if (DataReceived != null) // check if subscribedDi2015NewLine                    DataRecieved(sRecieved); // raise event with dataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SetupRecieveCallback(sock);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Client {0}, disconnected", sock.RemoteEndPoint);Di2015NewLine                sock.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Both);Di2015NewLine                sock.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // rest of code is sameDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18081365Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const double DoubleEpsilon = 2.22044604925031E-16;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Determines whether <paramref name="value1"/> is very close to <paramref name="value2"/>.</summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="value1">The value1.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="value2">The value2.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns><c>true</c> if <paramref name="value1"/> is very close to value2; otherwise, <c>false</c>.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static bool IsVeryCloseTo(this double value1, double value2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value1 == value2)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tolerance = (Math.Abs(value1) + Math.Abs(value2)) * DoubleEpsilon;Di2015NewLine    var difference = value1 - value2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return -tolerance < difference && tolerance > difference;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18081563Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DatabaseResourceManager : ResourceManagerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region Singleton pattern http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff650316.aspxDi2015NewLine    private static volatile DatabaseResourceManager instance;Di2015NewLine    private static object syncRoot = new Object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private DatabaseResourceManager() : base() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static DatabaseResourceManager InstanceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (instance == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (instance == null)Di2015NewLine                        instance = new DatabaseResourceManager();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return instance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ResourceSet InternalGetResourceSet(CultureInfo culture, bool createIfNotExists, bool tryParents)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (culture == null)Di2015NewLine            culture = CultureInfo.InvariantCulture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new DatabaseResourceSet(culture);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18081563Di2015UniqueSeparatorDatabaseResourceSet
18081563Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DatabaseResourceSet : ResourceSetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly CultureInfo culture;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<string, Hashtable> cachedResources = new Dictionary<string, Hashtable>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DatabaseResourceSet(CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (culture == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("culture");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.culture = culture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ReadResources();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void ReadResources()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (cachedResources.ContainsKey(culture.Name))Di2015NewLine        // retrieve cached resource setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Table = cachedResources[culture.Name];Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (MyDatabaseContext db = new MyDatabaseContext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var translations = from t in db.TranslationsDi2015NewLine                       where t.CultureIso == culture.NameDi2015NewLine                       select t;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var translation in translations)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Table.Add(translation.Chave, translation.Valor);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cachedResources[culture.Name] = Table;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18081563Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LocalizedRequiredAttribute : RequiredAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public LocalizedRequiredAttribute() : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string FormatErrorMessage(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string localErrorMessage = DatabaseResourceManager.Instance.GetString(this.ErrorMessageResourceName) ?? 18082447Di2015UniqueSeparator      strPhoto = csvuser.photo; // The string that represents the BLOBDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //remove first 2 chars (the '0x')Di2015NewLine      strPhoto = strPhoto.Remove(0, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //convert hex-string to bytes:Di2015NewLine      int NumberChars = strPhoto.Length/2;Di2015NewLine      byte[] bytes = new byte[NumberChars];Di2015NewLine      using (StringReader sr = new StringReader(strPhoto)){Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < NumberChars; i++)Di2015NewLine               bytes[i] = Convert.ToByte(new string(new char[2]{(char)sr.Read(), (char)sr.Read()}), 16);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Then we create a memory stream that holds the imageDi2015NewLine      MemoryStream photostream = new MemoryStream( bytes );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Then we can create a System.Drawing.Image by using the Memory streamDi2015NewLine      var photo = Image.FromStream(photostream);Di2015NewLine
